item.title: Windsor CC too easy for IC
item.author: Nitin B Nihalani,
item.description: Against the picturesque backdrop of Windsor Castle and loyally donning the club’s apparel, Imperial 1st XI put out one of its strongest line-ups to play against Windsor Cricket Club. Captain Jayanth Ganapathy, a former player for the opposition, elected to bat first on a good batting wicket with a …

item.title: Identify your Dream Team!
item.author: Nitin B Nihalani,
item.description: I’m sure you’ve all heard the phrase ‘two heads are better than one’. Seems pretty obvious, right? By this logic, it follows that three heads are better than two, four better than three and so on. Unfortunately, when it comes to startups, the equation is not quite so simple. Finding the right team …

item.title: Silicon Valley comes to Imperial
item.author: Nitin B Nihalani,
item.description: Imperial College has joined the elite list of universities participating in ‘Silicon Valley comes to the UK’ (SVC2UK), an annual event that brings successful Silicon Valley entrepreneurs to inspire students across the UK. Silicon Valley comes to Imperial (SVC2I), hosted by Imperial Entrepreneurs and …

item.title: Niche marketing on the net
item.author: Nitin B Nihalani,
item.description: These days it is quite difficult to find something in common with everyone in the world, apart from being human, but there is one thing that comes close: Internet users. There are about 2 billion of them according to internetworldstats.com. From a business point of view, this is the biggest market …
